# Next.js Dating/Meetup Application

## Project Overview
A Next.js 14+ application for connecting people through hobbies and location-based meetups with internationalization support (Vietnamese & English).

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14+ with App Router
- TypeScript (strict mode)
- Tailwind CSS
- NextAuth.js with Google OAuth
- next-intl for i18n
- Mock data for development
